6// ProgramExecutable.cpp: Collects the interfaces common to both Programs and
7// ProgramPipelines in order to execute/draw with either.
8
9#include "libANGLE/ProgramExecutable.h"
10
11#include "libANGLE/Context.h"
12#include "libANGLE/Program.h"
13#include "libANGLE/ProgramPipeline.h"
14#include "libANGLE/Shader.h"

16namespace gl
17{
18
19ProgramExecutable::ProgramExecutable()
20 : mMaxActiveAttribLocation(0),
21 mAttributesTypeMask(0),
22 mAttributesMask(0),
23 mActiveSamplersMask(0),
24 mActiveSamplerRefCounts{},
25 mActiveImagesMask(0),
26 mCanDrawWith(false),
27 mTransformFeedbackBufferMode(GL_INTERLEAVED_ATTRIBS),
28 mDefaultUniformRange(0, 0),
29 mSamplerUniformRange(0, 0),
30 mImageUniformRange(0, 0),
31 mPipelineHasGraphicsUniformBuffers(false),
32 mPipelineHasComputeUniformBuffers(false),
33 mPipelineHasGraphicsStorageBuffers(false),
34 mPipelineHasComputeStorageBuffers(false),
35 mPipelineHasGraphicsAtomicCounterBuffers(false),
36 mPipelineHasComputeAtomicCounterBuffers(false),
37 mPipelineHasGraphicsDefaultUniforms(false),
38 mPipelineHasComputeDefaultUniforms(false),
39 mPipelineHasGraphicsTextures(false),
40 mPipelineHasComputeTextures(false),
41 mPipelineHasGraphicsImages(false),
42 mPipelineHasComputeImages(false),
43 mIsCompute(false)
44{
45 reset();
46}
47
48ProgramExecutable::ProgramExecutable(const ProgramExecutable &other)
49 : mLinkedGraphicsShaderStages(other.mLinkedGraphicsShaderStages),
50 mLinkedComputeShaderStages(other.mLinkedComputeShaderStages),
51 mActiveAttribLocationsMask(other.mActiveAttribLocationsMask),
52 mMaxActiveAttribLocation(other.mMaxActiveAttribLocation),
53 mAttributesTypeMask(other.mAttributesTypeMask),
54 mAttributesMask(other.mAttributesMask),
55 mActiveSamplersMask(other.mActiveSamplersMask),
56 mActiveSamplerRefCounts(other.mActiveSamplerRefCounts),
57 mActiveSamplerTypes(other.mActiveSamplerTypes),
58 mActiveSamplerFormats(other.mActiveSamplerFormats),
59 mActiveSamplerShaderBits(other.mActiveSamplerShaderBits),
60 mActiveImagesMask(other.mActiveImagesMask),
61 mActiveImageShaderBits(other.mActiveImageShaderBits),
62 mCanDrawWith(other.mCanDrawWith),
63 mOutputVariables(other.mOutputVariables),
64 mOutputLocations(other.mOutputLocations),
65 mProgramInputs(other.mProgramInputs),
66 mLinkedTransformFeedbackVaryings(other.mLinkedTransformFeedbackVaryings),
67 mTransformFeedbackStrides(other.mTransformFeedbackStrides),
68 mTransformFeedbackBufferMode(other.mTransformFeedbackBufferMode),
69 mUniforms(other.mUniforms),
70 mDefaultUniformRange(other.mDefaultUniformRange),
71 mSamplerUniformRange(other.mSamplerUniformRange),
72 mUniformBlocks(other.mUniformBlocks),
73 mAtomicCounterBuffers(other.mAtomicCounterBuffers),
74 mImageUniformRange(other.mImageUniformRange),
75 mComputeShaderStorageBlocks(other.mComputeShaderStorageBlocks),
76 mGraphicsShaderStorageBlocks(other.mGraphicsShaderStorageBlocks),
77 mPipelineHasGraphicsUniformBuffers(other.mPipelineHasGraphicsUniformBuffers),
78 mPipelineHasComputeUniformBuffers(other.mPipelineHasComputeUniformBuffers),
79 mPipelineHasGraphicsStorageBuffers(other.mPipelineHasGraphicsStorageBuffers),
80 mPipelineHasComputeStorageBuffers(other.mPipelineHasComputeStorageBuffers),
81 mPipelineHasGraphicsAtomicCounterBuffers(other.mPipelineHasGraphicsAtomicCounterBuffers),
82 mPipelineHasComputeAtomicCounterBuffers(other.mPipelineHasComputeAtomicCounterBuffers),
83 mPipelineHasGraphicsDefaultUniforms(other.mPipelineHasGraphicsDefaultUniforms),
84 mPipelineHasComputeDefaultUniforms(other.mPipelineHasComputeDefaultUniforms),
85 mPipelineHasGraphicsTextures(other.mPipelineHasGraphicsTextures),
86 mPipelineHasComputeTextures(other.mPipelineHasComputeTextures),
87 mPipelineHasGraphicsImages(other.mPipelineHasGraphicsImages),
88 mPipelineHasComputeImages(other.mPipelineHasComputeImages),
89 mIsCompute(other.mIsCompute)
90{
91 reset();
92}
93
94ProgramExecutable::~ProgramExecutable() = default;
95
96void ProgramExecutable::reset()
97{
98 resetInfoLog();
99 mActiveAttribLocationsMask.reset();
100 mAttributesTypeMask.reset();
101 mAttributesMask.reset();
102 mMaxActiveAttribLocation = 0;
103
104 mActiveSamplersMask.reset();
105 mActiveSamplerRefCounts = {};
106 mActiveSamplerTypes.fill(TextureType::InvalidEnum);
107 mActiveSamplerFormats.fill(SamplerFormat::InvalidEnum);
108
109 mActiveImagesMask.reset();
110
111 mProgramInputs.clear();
112 mLinkedTransformFeedbackVaryings.clear();
113 mUniforms.clear();
114 mUniformBlocks.clear();
115 mComputeShaderStorageBlocks.clear();
116 mGraphicsShaderStorageBlocks.clear();
117 mAtomicCounterBuffers.clear();
118 mOutputVariables.clear();
119 mOutputLocations.clear();
120 mSamplerBindings.clear();
121 mComputeImageBindings.clear();
122 mGraphicsImageBindings.clear();
123
124 mPipelineHasGraphicsUniformBuffers = false;
125 mPipelineHasComputeUniformBuffers = false;
126 mPipelineHasGraphicsStorageBuffers = false;
127 mPipelineHasComputeStorageBuffers = false;
128 mPipelineHasGraphicsAtomicCounterBuffers = false;
129 mPipelineHasComputeAtomicCounterBuffers = false;
130 mPipelineHasGraphicsDefaultUniforms = false;
131 mPipelineHasComputeDefaultUniforms = false;
132 mPipelineHasGraphicsTextures = false;
133 mPipelineHasComputeTextures = false;
134}
135
136void ProgramExecutable::load(gl::BinaryInputStream *stream)
137{
138 static_assert(MAX_VERTEX_ATTRIBS * 2 <= sizeof(uint32_t) * 8,
139 "Too many vertex attribs for mask: All bits of mAttributesTypeMask types and "
140 "mask fit into 32 bits each");
141 mAttributesTypeMask = gl::ComponentTypeMask(stream->readInt<uint32_t>());
142 mAttributesMask = gl::AttributesMask(stream->readInt<uint32_t>());
143 mActiveAttribLocationsMask = gl::AttributesMask(stream->readInt<uint32_t>());
144 mMaxActiveAttribLocation = stream->readInt<unsigned int>();
145
146 mLinkedGraphicsShaderStages = ShaderBitSet(stream->readInt<uint8_t>());
147 mLinkedComputeShaderStages = ShaderBitSet(stream->readInt<uint8_t>());
148 mIsCompute = stream->readBool();
149
150 mPipelineHasGraphicsUniformBuffers = stream->readBool();
151 mPipelineHasComputeUniformBuffers = stream->readBool();
152 mPipelineHasGraphicsStorageBuffers = stream->readBool();
153 mPipelineHasComputeStorageBuffers = stream->readBool();
154 mPipelineHasGraphicsAtomicCounterBuffers = stream->readBool();
155 mPipelineHasComputeAtomicCounterBuffers = stream->readBool();
156 mPipelineHasGraphicsDefaultUniforms = stream->readBool();
157 mPipelineHasComputeDefaultUniforms = stream->readBool();
158 mPipelineHasGraphicsTextures = stream->readBool();
159 mPipelineHasComputeTextures = stream->readBool();
160}
161
162void ProgramExecutable::save(gl::BinaryOutputStream *stream) const
163{
164 static_assert(MAX_VERTEX_ATTRIBS * 2 <= sizeof(uint32_t) * 8,
165 "All bits of mAttributesTypeMask types and mask fit into 32 bits each");
166 stream->writeInt(static_cast<uint32_t>(mAttributesTypeMask.to_ulong()));
167 stream->writeInt(static_cast<uint32_t>(mAttributesMask.to_ulong()));
168 stream->writeInt(static_cast<uint32_t>(mActiveAttribLocationsMask.to_ulong()));
169 stream->writeInt(mMaxActiveAttribLocation);
170
171 stream->writeInt(mLinkedGraphicsShaderStages.bits());
172 stream->writeInt(mLinkedComputeShaderStages.bits());
173 stream->writeBool(mIsCompute);
174
175 stream->writeBool(mPipelineHasGraphicsUniformBuffers);
176 stream->writeBool(mPipelineHasComputeUniformBuffers);
177 stream->writeBool(mPipelineHasGraphicsStorageBuffers);
178 stream->writeBool(mPipelineHasComputeStorageBuffers);
179 stream->writeBool(mPipelineHasGraphicsAtomicCounterBuffers);
180 stream->writeBool(mPipelineHasComputeAtomicCounterBuffers);
181 stream->writeBool(mPipelineHasGraphicsDefaultUniforms);
182 stream->writeBool(mPipelineHasComputeDefaultUniforms);
183 stream->writeBool(mPipelineHasGraphicsTextures);
184 stream->writeBool(mPipelineHasComputeTextures);
185}
186
187int ProgramExecutable::getInfoLogLength() const
188{
189 return static_cast<int>(mInfoLog.getLength());
190}
191
192void ProgramExecutable::getInfoLog(GLsizei bufSize, GLsizei *length, char *infoLog) const
193{
194 return mInfoLog.getLog(bufSize, length, infoLog);
195}
196
197std::string ProgramExecutable::getInfoLogString() const
198{
199 return mInfoLog.str();
200}
201
202bool ProgramExecutable::isAttribLocationActive(size_t attribLocation) const
203{
204 // TODO(timvp): http://anglebug.com/3570: Enable this assert here somehow.
205 // ASSERT(!mLinkingState);
206 ASSERT(attribLocation < mActiveAttribLocationsMask.size());
207 return mActiveAttribLocationsMask[attribLocation];
208}
209
210AttributesMask ProgramExecutable::getAttributesMask() const
211{
212 // TODO(timvp): http://anglebug.com/3570: Enable this assert here somehow.
213 // ASSERT(!mLinkingState);
214 return mAttributesMask;
215}
216
217bool ProgramExecutable::hasDefaultUniforms() const
218{
219 return !getDefaultUniformRange().empty() ||
220 (isCompute() ? mPipelineHasComputeDefaultUniforms : mPipelineHasGraphicsDefaultUniforms);
221}
222
223bool ProgramExecutable::hasTextures() const
224{
225 return !getSamplerBindings().empty() ||
226 (isCompute() ? mPipelineHasComputeTextures : mPipelineHasGraphicsTextures);
227}
228
229// TODO: http://anglebug.com/3570: Remove mHas*UniformBuffers once PPO's have valid data in
230// mUniformBlocks
231bool ProgramExecutable::hasUniformBuffers() const
232{
233 return !getUniformBlocks().empty() ||
234 (isCompute() ? mPipelineHasComputeUniformBuffers : mPipelineHasGraphicsUniformBuffers);
235}
236
237bool ProgramExecutable::hasStorageBuffers() const
238{
239 return (isCompute() ? hasComputeStorageBuffers() : hasGraphicsStorageBuffers());
240}
241
242bool ProgramExecutable::hasGraphicsStorageBuffers() const
243{
244 return !mGraphicsShaderStorageBlocks.empty() || mPipelineHasGraphicsStorageBuffers;
245}
246
247bool ProgramExecutable::hasComputeStorageBuffers() const
248{
249 return !mComputeShaderStorageBlocks.empty() || mPipelineHasComputeStorageBuffers;
250}
251
252bool ProgramExecutable::hasAtomicCounterBuffers() const
253{
254 return !getAtomicCounterBuffers().empty() ||
255 (isCompute() ? mPipelineHasComputeAtomicCounterBuffers
256 : mPipelineHasGraphicsAtomicCounterBuffers);
257}
258
259bool ProgramExecutable::hasImages() const
260{
261 return (isCompute() ? hasComputeImages() : hasGraphicsImages());
262}
263
264bool ProgramExecutable::hasGraphicsImages() const
265{
266 return !mGraphicsImageBindings.empty() || mPipelineHasGraphicsImages;
267}
268
269bool ProgramExecutable::hasComputeImages() const
270{
271 return !mComputeImageBindings.empty() || mPipelineHasComputeImages;
272}
273
274GLuint ProgramExecutable::getUniformIndexFromImageIndex(GLuint imageIndex) const
275{
276 ASSERT(imageIndex < mImageUniformRange.length());
277 return imageIndex + mImageUniformRange.low();
278}
279
280void ProgramExecutable::updateActiveSamplers(const ProgramState &programState)
281{
282 const std::vector<SamplerBinding> &samplerBindings = programState.getSamplerBindings();
283
284 for (uint32_t samplerIndex = 0; samplerIndex < samplerBindings.size(); ++samplerIndex)
285 {
286 const SamplerBinding &samplerBinding = samplerBindings[samplerIndex];
287 uint32_t uniformIndex = programState.getUniformIndexFromSamplerIndex(samplerIndex);
288 const gl::LinkedUniform &samplerUniform = programState.getUniforms()[uniformIndex];
289
290 for (GLint textureUnit : samplerBinding.boundTextureUnits)
291 {
292 if (++mActiveSamplerRefCounts[textureUnit] == 1)
293 {
294 mActiveSamplerTypes[textureUnit] = samplerBinding.textureType;
295 mActiveSamplerFormats[textureUnit] = samplerBinding.format;
296 mActiveSamplerShaderBits[textureUnit] = samplerUniform.activeShaders();
297 }
298 else
299 {
300 if (mActiveSamplerTypes[textureUnit] != samplerBinding.textureType)
301 {
302 mActiveSamplerTypes[textureUnit] = TextureType::InvalidEnum;
303 }
304 if (mActiveSamplerFormats[textureUnit] != samplerBinding.format)
305 {
306 mActiveSamplerFormats[textureUnit] = SamplerFormat::InvalidEnum;
307 }
308 }
309 mActiveSamplersMask.set(textureUnit);
310 }
311 }
312}
313
314void ProgramExecutable::updateActiveImages(const ProgramExecutable &executable)
315{
316 const std::vector<ImageBinding> *imageBindings = getImageBindings();
317 for (uint32_t imageIndex = 0; imageIndex < imageBindings->size(); ++imageIndex)
318 {
319 const gl::ImageBinding &imageBinding = imageBindings->at(imageIndex);
320
321 uint32_t uniformIndex = executable.getUniformIndexFromImageIndex(imageIndex);
322 const gl::LinkedUniform &imageUniform = executable.getUniforms()[uniformIndex];
323 const ShaderBitSet shaderBits = imageUniform.activeShaders();
324 for (GLint imageUnit : imageBinding.boundImageUnits)
325 {
326 mActiveImagesMask.set(imageUnit);
327 if (isCompute())
328 {
329 mActiveImageShaderBits[imageUnit].set(gl::ShaderType::Compute);
330 }
331 else
332 {
333 mActiveImageShaderBits[imageUnit] = shaderBits;
334 }
335 }
336 }
337}
338
339void ProgramExecutable::setSamplerUniformTextureTypeAndFormat(
340 size_t textureUnitIndex,
341 std::vector<SamplerBinding> &samplerBindings)
342{
343 bool foundBinding = false;
344 TextureType foundType = TextureType::InvalidEnum;
345 SamplerFormat foundFormat = SamplerFormat::InvalidEnum;
346
347 for (const SamplerBinding &binding : samplerBindings)
348 {
349 // A conflict exists if samplers of different types are sourced by the same texture unit.
350 // We need to check all bound textures to detect this error case.
351 for (GLuint textureUnit : binding.boundTextureUnits)
352 {
353 if (textureUnit == textureUnitIndex)
354 {
355 if (!foundBinding)
356 {
357 foundBinding = true;
358 foundType = binding.textureType;
359 foundFormat = binding.format;
360 }
361 else
362 {
363 if (foundType != binding.textureType)
364 {
365 foundType = TextureType::InvalidEnum;
366 }
367 if (foundFormat != binding.format)
368 {
369 foundFormat = SamplerFormat::InvalidEnum;
370 }
371 }
372 }
373 }
374 }
375
376 mActiveSamplerTypes[textureUnitIndex] = foundType;
377 mActiveSamplerFormats[textureUnitIndex] = foundFormat;
378}
379
380bool ProgramExecutable::linkValidateGlobalNames(
381 InfoLog &infoLog,
382 const ShaderMap<const ProgramState *> &programStates) const
383{
384 std::unordered_map<std::string, const sh::ShaderVariable *> uniformMap;
385 using BlockAndFieldPair = std::pair<const sh::InterfaceBlock *, const sh::ShaderVariable *>;
386 std::unordered_map<std::string, std::vector<BlockAndFieldPair>> uniformBlockFieldMap;
387
388 for (ShaderType shaderType : kAllGraphicsShaderTypes)
389 {
390 const ProgramState *programState = programStates[shaderType];
391 if (!programState)
392 {
393 continue;
394 }
395 Shader *shader = programState->getAttachedShader(shaderType);
396 if (!shader)
397 {
398 continue;
399 }
400
401 // Build a map of Uniforms
402 const std::vector<sh::ShaderVariable> uniforms = shader->getUniforms();
403 for (const auto &uniform : uniforms)
404 {
405 uniformMap[uniform.name] = &uniform;
406 }
407
408 // Build a map of Uniform Blocks
409 // This will also detect any field name conflicts between Uniform Blocks without instance
410 // names
411 const std::vector<sh::InterfaceBlock> &uniformBlocks = shader->getUniformBlocks();
412 for (const auto &uniformBlock : uniformBlocks)
413 {
414 // Only uniform blocks without an instance name can create a conflict with their field
415 // names
416 if (!uniformBlock.instanceName.empty())
417 {
418 continue;
419 }
420
421 for (const auto &field : uniformBlock.fields)
422 {
423 if (!uniformBlockFieldMap.count(field.name))
424 {
425 // First time we've seen this uniform block field name, so add the
426 // (Uniform Block, Field) pair immediately since there can't be a conflict yet
427 BlockAndFieldPair blockAndFieldPair(&uniformBlock, &field);
428 std::vector<BlockAndFieldPair> newUniformBlockList;
429 newUniformBlockList.push_back(blockAndFieldPair);
430 uniformBlockFieldMap[field.name] = newUniformBlockList;
431 continue;
432 }
433
434 // We've seen this name before.
435 // We need to check each of the uniform blocks that contain a field with this name
436 // to see if there's a conflict or not.
437 std::vector<BlockAndFieldPair> prevBlockFieldPairs =
438 uniformBlockFieldMap[field.name];
439 for (const auto &prevBlockFieldPair : prevBlockFieldPairs)
440 {
441 const sh::InterfaceBlock *prevUniformBlock = prevBlockFieldPair.first;
442 const sh::ShaderVariable *prevUniformBlockField = prevBlockFieldPair.second;
443
444 if (uniformBlock.isSameInterfaceBlockAtLinkTime(*prevUniformBlock))
445 {
446 // The same uniform block should, by definition, contain the same field name
447 continue;
448 }
449
450 // The uniform blocks don't match, so check if the necessary field properties
451 // also match
452 if ((field.name == prevUniformBlockField->name) &&
453 (field.type == prevUniformBlockField->type) &&
454 (field.precision == prevUniformBlockField->precision))
455 {
456 infoLog << "Name conflicts between uniform block field names: "
457 << field.name;
458 return false;
459 }
460 }
461
462 // No conflict, so record this pair
463 BlockAndFieldPair blockAndFieldPair(&uniformBlock, &field);
464 uniformBlockFieldMap[field.name].push_back(blockAndFieldPair);
465 }
466 }
467 }
468
469 // Validate no uniform names conflict with attribute names
470 const ProgramState *programState = programStates[ShaderType::Vertex];
471 if (programState)
472 {
473 Shader *vertexShader = programState->getAttachedShader(ShaderType::Vertex);
474 if (vertexShader)
475 {
476 for (const auto &attrib : vertexShader->getActiveAttributes())
477 {
478 if (uniformMap.count(attrib.name))
479 {
480 infoLog << "Name conflicts between a uniform and an attribute: " << attrib.name;
481 return false;
482 }
483 }
484 }
485 }
486
487 // Validate no Uniform Block fields conflict with other Uniforms
488 for (const auto &uniformBlockField : uniformBlockFieldMap)
489 {
490 const std::string &fieldName = uniformBlockField.first;
491 if (uniformMap.count(fieldName))
492 {
493 infoLog << "Name conflicts between a uniform and a uniform block field: " << fieldName;
494 return false;
495 }
496 }
497
498 return true;
499}
500
501void ProgramExecutable::updateCanDrawWith()
502{
503 mCanDrawWith =
504 (hasLinkedShaderStage(ShaderType::Vertex) && hasLinkedShaderStage(ShaderType::Fragment));
505}
506
507void ProgramExecutable::saveLinkedStateInfo(const ProgramState &state)
508{
509 for (ShaderType shaderType : getLinkedShaderStages())
510 {
511 Shader *shader = state.getAttachedShader(shaderType);
512 ASSERT(shader);
513 mLinkedOutputVaryings[shaderType] = shader->getOutputVaryings();
514 mLinkedInputVaryings[shaderType] = shader->getInputVaryings();
515 mLinkedShaderVersions[shaderType] = shader->getShaderVersion();
516 }
517}
